TopicTitle: Star trek online "sorry we cannot serve to people under 13."

Articles.Content: Im getting when i try to register for star trek online 'sorry we cannot serve to people under 13.' yet when i entered my birthdate, i say im older than 13 years old. why is this happening?

Because lying gets you nowhere in life. They know who you are.

Jokes are hard to make. :/

>_<

could you actually give me an answer?

Here? https://register.perfectworld.com/sto_splash

Are you putting it in Month, Day, Year. As long as the year is lower than 1999 it should be working.

If its just not working, go here: https://register.perfectworld.com/register/help

The last Q/A has a link to their email support, tell them the issue.

Here? https://register.perfectworld.com/sto_splash

Are you putting it in Month, Day, Year. As long as the year is lower than 1999 it should be working.

If its just not working, go here: https://register.perfectworld.com/register/help

The last Q/A has a link to their email support, tell them the issue.

yep its not working and yes i contacted them, i just posted here to see if i could get a quicker answer.
Ok, i got a reply, saying to clear my cookies and cache, and it worked!
At the lowest setting in the game would i get a fair 15 fps in the game with these specs?

You could have used your other thread rather than creating a new one.

But to answer your question - probably not. I can\'t say for sure, but your PC is pretty old now, I suggest getting a new one (don\'t even bother upgrading that).
[mod] Okay, merging these two. Only need one thread for this.[/mod]

If you need support for Star Trek Online, try their forums. This forums is not for support of other games.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
